title: Sanctions will put Russia's 'fortress' economy to the test
Ukrainians are fleeing in droves. But they're waiting more than 60 hours at the border
description: Ukrainians have been leaving the country in huge numbers following the Russian invasion that began on Thursday, but many are being forced to wait more than 60 hours in long queues to cross into neighboring Poland.

title: What the clothes in Peter Dinklage's new film tell us about the world of a tragic hero
description: How do you give a visual makeover to a classic tale that's centered around appearances? That was the question facing award-winning costume designer Massimo Cantini Parrini when he began work on the latest screen adaptation of Edmond Rostand's 1897 play "Cyrano de Bergerac," and he had 26 days to figure it out.

title: America's disdain for Black men and boys hasn't diminished in the years since Trayvon Martin was killed
description: A version of this story appeared in CNN's Race Deconstructed newsletter. To get it in your inbox every week, sign up for free here.

title: Pedestrians dodge ice sheets falling from NYC skyscrapers
description: Police closed off several streets in Midtown Manhattan after large pieces of ice began falling from the sky.

title: Zelensky: Ukrainian President refuses US offer to evacuate
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has turned down an offer from the United States of evacuation from the capital city Kyiv, the Ukraine embassy in Britain said Saturday on Twitter.

title: Ashton Kutcher tweets support for Ukraine, home country of wife Mila Kunis
description: Celebrities and political figures have been voicing support for Ukraine since Russia invaded this week.

title: From bad luck to good: How a car wreck led to a $25,000 lottery win
description: Talk about turning lemons into lemonade.

title: Video shows man try to stop Russian tank with his body
description: Dramatic video out of Bakhmach, Ukraine, shows a man attempting to stop a Russian tank with his body.

title: 'Remarkable': CNN reporter spots major Russian tank movement on live TV
description: CNN's Frederik Pleitgen spots heavy Russian tanks moving towards Ukraine near Belgorod, Russia.

title: Spacecraft witnesses massive solar eruption
description: As a space enthusiast, I've always wanted to sail among the stars to a galaxy far, far away.

title: Watch Ketanji Brown Jackson's call from President Biden
description: See the moment that President Joe Biden called Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson and asked her to be his nominee to be the next justice on the Supreme Court.

title: For one Ukrainian American family, a mix of anger, fear and regret
description: Alex Podebryi has barely slept in three days.

title: A look back at some of the NAACP Image Awards Entertainer of the Year winners
description: The NAACP Image Awards are taking place Saturday night.

title: Poland refuse to face Russia in crucial World Cup qualification match
description: The Polish national team will not face Russia in a crucial 2022 World Cup qualification playoff match in March because of Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

title: 'Don't trust Putin': Ukraine's former president speaks to CNN from streets
description: Former Ukrainian President Petro Poroshenko joins CNN from Kyiv to warn the world about Russian President Vladimir Putin.

title: Mid-budget movies as we knew them are in decline. What does that mean for cinema?
description: Many have lamented the perceived demise of the mid-budget movie in recent years.

title: James Harden all smiles as he excels in Philadelphia 76ers debut after blockbuster trade
description: Philadelphia 76ers superstar Joel Embiid squeezes a plastic water bottle into his mouth, looks over to the player he's sharing the press conference table with and says: "That's good."

title: Drew Barrymore loses it over surprise visit from Netflix star
description: Penn Badgley superfan Drew Barrymore didn't hold back when the "You" actor made a guest appearance on her talk show.

title: The surprising reason why Wendy's burgers are square
description: It doesn't matter where you go: Fast-food hamburgers almost uniformly look like the same round, flat patties. Except for Wendy's, which has square burgers.

title: How the Ukraine conflict could redraw the world air map
description: Russia's invasion of Ukraine and aviation bans are creating huge no-go areas in the sky, with major implications for long-haul carriers that normally criss-cross the skies of Eastern Europe en route to Asia.

title: Battle moves into Kyiv as Ukrainians fight to keep control of their capital
description: Explosions and bursts of gunfire could be heard on the streets of the Ukrainian capital Kyiv Saturday morning, as the country's military battled to hold back advancing Russian troops amid defiant calls for residents to resist and stand their ground.

title: New video shows explosions over the skies of Kyiv
description: Explosions have been seen and heard near Kyiv as Russian forces close in on the Ukrainian capital. CNN's Alex Marquardt has more.

title: Largest, highest, tallest: Record-setters in travel
description: Carnival celebrations are taking place around the world ahead of Mardi Gras, and the world's largest cruise ship is poised to set sail. But travel is also being impacted by Covid restrictions and the Ukraine invasion.

title: Fighting has spilled into the streets of Kyiv and an apartment building was struck as Ukrainian forces attempt to stave off Russia's advance
Fleeing Ukrainians are leaving husbands, sons and brothers behind
How US intelligence got it right on Ukraine
description: President Joe Biden and US officials got the intelligence right: They said Russia would invade Ukraine, despite Russia's assurances to the contrary. After a supreme miscalculation on how the pullout from Afghanistan would go, misguided intelligence on the run-up to the war in Iraq and many other mistakes, this is an important moment for the US intelligence community.

title: Russia says it's not hitting Ukraine's civilian infrastructure. Evidence suggests otherwise
description: • Bridge which connects Russian-held areas to Ukraine enveloped in smoke

title: NHL star and past Putin supporter Alex Ovechkin: 'Please, no more war'
description: Russian-born NHL player Alex Ovechkin has expressed his hope for an end to hostilities between Russia and Ukraine.

title: US to impose sanctions on Putin, joining EU and UK in targeting Russian leader
description: The US is planning to impose sanctions on Russian President Vladimir Putin as soon as Friday, according to two people familiar with the decision.

title: Russian NHL star and past Putin supporter Alex Ovechkin: 'Please, no more war'
